name: The Incredible Machine Version 3.0
notes:
* Installer with throw some error messages. They can safely be ignored. 
* When the GOG installer completes, click 'Exit' and not 'Launch'.
* Make sure the set audio setting in Wine Configuration to get audio working. Auto doesn't seem to work properly.
* Throws "No CD" error on exit. It can be ignored.
* No CD Audio. Seeing if it is possible.
content:
files:
- GOG_INSTALLER: N/A:Please select the GOG installer
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/TIM 3/TIMWIN.EXE
  gogid: 1207664053
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    install_gecko: false
    install_mono: false
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: corefonts ariel
    arch: win32
    description: Installing fonts
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    args: /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES /SP-
    description: Running GOG Installer
    executable: GOG_INSTALLER
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    key: Version
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\AppDefaults\TIMWIN.EXE
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    value: win95
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  exclude_processes: HELP.EXE help.exe winevdm.exe
